column4: I'm on 11.10. Apparently Adobe Reader isn't in the official repository anymore? I actually need it because my state does this "smart PDF" crap for state taxes that ONLY works right in official Adobe. What's the most painless way to do this?
go to adobes site and select the one you want and the software centre will open
that actually gave me a BIN file to download...
there is deb file if you look for it
